app_descript:
App Name: Hidden Objects Christmas Trees

Brief: Embark on a festive quest with Hidden Objects Christmas Trees, a game that combines the joy of Christmas and the thrill of mystery-solving. Perfect for players of all ages, this game invites you to immerse yourself in a Yuletide adventure. Uncover hidden treasures in cozy winter scenes, decorate your tree with precious ornaments, and get into the holiday spirit before the first snowfall. Whether you're snug by the fire or waiting for Santa's sleigh, these enchanting puzzles offer a merry mix of tradition and fun.
